TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GroupBox extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 控件，该控件显示围绕一组具有可选标题的控件的框架。

span.span: Represents a Windows control that displays a frame around a group of controls with an optional caption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在一组控件周围显示一个框架，其中有或没有标题。The displays a frame around a group of controls with or without a caption. 使用 对窗体上的控件集合进行逻辑分组。Use a to logically group a collection of controls on a form. 分组框是可用于定义控件组的容器控件。The group box is a container control that can be used to define groups of controls. 分组框的典型用途是包含 控件的逻辑组。The typical use for a group box is to contain a logical group of controls. 如果有两个分组框，其中每个都包含多个选项按钮（也称为单选按钮），则每组按钮都是互斥的，每组设置一个选项值。If you have two group boxes, each of which contain several option buttons (also known as radio buttons), each group of buttons is mutually exclusive, setting one option value per group. 您可以使用 属性的 方法将控件添加到 。You can add controls to the by using the method of the property. > [!NOTE] > 只有 控件中包含的控件可以选择或接收焦点。Only controls that are contained within the control can be selected or receive focus. 不能选择完整 本身，也不能接收焦点。The complete itself cannot be selected or receive focus. 有关此控件如何响应 和 方法的详细信息，请参阅以下 成员： 、、、、、。For more information about how this control responds to the and methods, see the following members: , , , , , . 无法显示滚动条。The cannot display a scroll bar. 如果需要类似于可包含滚动条的 的控件，请参阅 控件。If you need a control similar to a that can contain a scroll bar, see the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实例化并创建 和两个 控件。The following code example instantiates and creates a and two controls. 单选按钮将添加到组框，并且组框将添加到 中。The radio buttons are added to the group box and the group box is added to the . [!code-csharp[Classic GroupBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic GroupBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic GroupBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic GroupBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当创建新的 时， 属性设置为 `false`。By default, the property is set to `false` when a new is created. 分组框的初始高度为100像素，宽度为200像素。The group box has an initial height of 100 pixels and width of 200 pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实例化并创建 和两个 控件。The following code example instantiates and creates a and two controls. 选项按钮（也称为单选按钮）会添加到组框，并且组框将添加到 中。The option buttons (also known as radio buttons) are added to the group box, and the group box is added to the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `GroupBox1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `GroupBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件为顶级控件，则此方法不会缩放控件的位置。If the control is top level, this method will not scale the control's location. 此方法不缩放子级或自动调整大小的控件的大小。This method does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls. 您可以通过更改 `specified` 参数的值，忽略任何方向的缩放。You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseCompatibleTextRendering : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 是否应使用 类来执行文本呈现，以便与版本1.0 和1.1 兼容。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 属性旨在提供 Windows 窗体控件之间的视觉兼容性，这些控件使用 类呈现文本，并使用 [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] 类 [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] 和 执行自定义文本呈现的应用程序。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不是从 [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]升级，则建议你将 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 设置为默认值 "`false`"。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 中引入了基于 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 的 类以提高性能，使文本更好地显示，并改善对国际字体的支持。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的早期版本中，将使用基于 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 的 类来执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算不同于 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]的字符间距和自动换行。calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在使用 类呈现文本的 Windows 窗体应用程序中，这可能会导致使用 的控件的文本与应用程序中的其他文本显示不相同。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决这种不兼容性问题，可将 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 属性设置为特定控件 `true`。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要将 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 设置为应用程序中所有支持的控件 `true`，请使用 `true`的参数调用 方法。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.
